name: Skill Shot Archery - PvP
description:
Are you ready to turn your marksmanship into real prizes with a steady hand? Then awaken your inner champion and start your Skill Shot Archery eSports career.

Skill Shot Archery is powered by Skillz, the world's leading eSports platform for everyone. This means that you can win real cash prizes and withdraw them at any time directly from the app.

Start with training tournaments against other players. Hit the targets to collect bonus points and drive your score up. Shoot combos and perfect rounds to defeat your opponent.

Training tournaments are always free. Play as long as you want, whenever you want. You never have to wait for an opponent.

Start your Skill Shot Archery eSport career today for free. Game on!
